node.label: mental-health-risk
node.overall-formulation: ((title "Risk formulation") (headings (("RISKS BEING FORMULATED (Problem risks)" 2)("Risk triggers (Precipitating factors)" 2) ("Persistent contextual factors (Perpetuating)" 2) ("Past factors (Historical, Pre-existing or Predisposing)" 2) ("Protective factors" 2))))
node.overall-management: ((title "Safety Plan") (headings (("Things to do immediately to stay safe" 2) ("On-going issues to deal with (e.g. where the person lives and who with, long-term physical conditions)" 2) ("Long-standing issues to deal with (e.g. effects of past trauma or abuse, low self-esteem, anxiety)" 2))))
